TextView.android:text:
In the home page, you can track flights by airport code or flight number or select saved flights.
 
 Tracking new flights:
 	- Select the method, type the code/number and click Track Me.
 		If 'Airport Code' is selected, a dialog box prompts the user to select arrivals or departures to display flights.
 		If 'Flight Number' is selected, the found flight(s) are displayed.
 	Click on the desired flight to display detailed information and/or save it to your list.
 
 Saved flights:
 	After flights are tracked, user has the option to save them to 'My Flights' list.
 	This list allows user to check flight information by clicking on the desired flight or delete it from the list.
